title: Financial Rescue LLC Reviews on the Debt Industry
text:
July 27, 2015 15:13 ET Financial Rescue LLC Reviews on the Debt Industry 
MILPITAS, CA--(Marketwired - Jul 27, 2015) - Coming toward the end of July, we're just over halfway through the year and it's time to round up some of the best companies out there for financial advice. 
One company in particular, Financial Rescue LLC, has worked its way to the top of the financial ladder because of its outstanding customer service and financial advice. Financial Rescue is a debt settlement and debt resolution service that connects people with trustworthy companies that can help ease the debt situation. The average consumer has six credit cards as well as other debts such as mortgages, loans, and back taxes. Over 1/3 of Americans are in debt and facing collections. The situation can be fairly scary and it is difficult to find a place to turn to. A lot of debt settlement companies seem to be out to get the consumer and earn their profits rather than actually help the consumer reach their debt resolution goals. The good news is that we find Financial Rescue LLC which boasts its ability to help everyone. 
On their easy-to-use, user friendly webpage, one can find endless amounts of knowledge that can be extremely useful to anyone in any kind of financial situation, not just a consumer in debt. Financial Rescue LLC primarily focuses on helping put those in debt in contact with a debt settlement or debt reduction company that fits their specific needs and helps them achieve their financial goals but they also feature an abundance of information about good financial habits and goals that anyone can relate to. The webpage features articles on various segments of the financial industry and is very educational to those who may not know what their options are as far as debt settlement goes. 
Rod Mercado, the CEO of Financial Rescue LLC, prides himself on being able to help everyone regardless of their situation. His humble beginnings in the industry have given him the experience and know-how to become an expert in the field all while continuing to build a credible, reliable service to those looking at their debt resolution and settlement options. Mercado has received numerous awards and acknowledgments for his contribution to the financial industry and particular recognition from his community in San Jose, California. 
Financial Rescue LLC has an A+ rating from the Better Business Bureau and one can find a plethora of positive reviews and experiences from real customers who have worked with Rod Mercado and his team. If you're in debt and are looking for real solutions, don't hesitate to call Financial Rescue LLC or visit their website at http://www.financialrescuellc.com Contact Information
